ygData.subject: Where/What should a Troll Sk hunt to get to 8?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Brothers/Sisters, Ok, so I m a bubble and a half from 8, but wondering what I should be fighting... So far it s been mainly Froglok Fishermen. The
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Brothers/Sisters,

Ok, so I'm a bubble and a half from 8, but wondering what I should
be fighting... So far it's been mainly Froglok Fishermen.

The Lizards in Feerott are mostly conning green at this point,
although when I cross the bridge at this point they all con yeller
(Lizard Warrior).

Anyways tips, hints, or any other info that will help a young Troll
Sk is much appreciated.

~Skorned
